bill_title: revise certain provisions regarding the responsibility to remove snow from certain state highways.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding the responsibility to remove snow from certain state highways. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-4-5 be amended to read: 31-4-5. If any state trunk highway includes a connecting street within a municipality over twenty-five hundred population, the Department of Transportation shall maintain the street. However, the snow removal from the street is the duty of the first or second class municipality within whose boundaries the street lies any municipality with a population of over two thousand five hundred is responsible for the snow and ice removal from the street. If the street is located within a municipality with a population of two thousand five hundred or less, the department is responsible for the snow and ice removal from the street including any paved portion of the street's right of way. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions regarding the responsibility to remove snow from certain state highways. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-4-5 be amended to read: 31-4-5. If any state trunk highway includes a connecting street within a municipality over twenty-five hundred population, the Department of Transportation shall maintain the street. However, the snow removal from the street is the duty of the first or second class municipality within whose boundaries the street lies any municipality with a population of over two thousand five hundred is responsible for the snow and ice removal from the street. If the street is located within a municipality with a population of two thousand five hundred or less, the department is responsible for the snow and ice removal from the street including any paved portion of the street's right of way. This section does not require the department to remove any snow or ice from sidewalks. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
